titles.title: Airport Noise Curfew Act of 2005
To establish the Airport Noise Curfew Commission.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Aviation.

bill.summary: 2/1/2005--Introduced. Airport Noise Curfew Act of 2005 - Establishes the Airport Noise Curfew Commission to study and make recommendations to Congress regarding the establishment of curfews on nonmilitary aircraft operations over populated areas of the United States during normal sleeping hours.
